fields.name: Avoriaz
fields.about: A charmingly quirky resort that’s a top ski destination for snowboard lovers. Avoriaz boasts a prime position in the centre of the Portes du Soleil. With the best snow in the area and the best freestyle terrain in Europe. It’s well worth putting at the top of your ride list.

fields.name: Davos
fields.about: One of the biggest and most established resorts in Switzerland. Davos belongs to the elite. Classic snowboard resort, called the ‘Best Alps Mountain’. There’s something for everyone - enjoy great riding conditions on thousands of metres. Well-groomed piste and all the great conveniences you’d expect from a chic cosmopolitan town.

fields.name: Les Gets
fields.about: A beautiful Les Gets sits between Lake Geneva and Mont Blanc. With not only stunning scenery but also links to the entire Portes du Soleil snowboarding area. With cosy mountain restaurants, a huge variety of accommodation.  Christmas spirit in France? Les Gets is not a resort to be missed.
